description: The file is an HTML source code for a web-based database viewer interface. It includes embedded JavaScript for dynamic data fetching and UI interactions, defining the structure and behavior of the database browsing dashboard.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections, and updates the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a specific database to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data in a table format within the content area.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders a table cell, handling special content like objects or long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better visibility.
